meanings.definition: Relating to or constituting a proposition or statement.
meanings.sent1: The thetic statement was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She presented a thetic argument in her essay.
meanings.sent3: The thetic nature of his speech made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thetic explanation was like a bright light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The thetic concept was as solid as a rock in their minds.

meanings.definition: Expressing or relating to a thesis or theory.
meanings.sent1: The thetic approach to the topic was well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent2: His thetic analysis of the data provided valuable insights.
meanings.sent3: The thetic idea sparked a lively debate among the students.
meanings.sent4: Her thetic interpretation of the text was like a key unlocking hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The thetic theory stood out like a colorful flower in a field of grass.
